metadata.name: Celebrity
metadata.description:
Forever the center of attention. 
Forever isolated and alone.  
Forever seen by a million eyes, 
never connected to a single soul. 

The ethos of celebrity is reflective of the isolation created within societies abstract acknowledgement of what are success and failure. 

Image created at a fashion show in Manhattan, while one of the worlds most highly recognized celebrities of the time is bombarded by the press. The celebrity became the focus of attention, completely overshadowing the designer. This image is representational of the manufactured isolationism created by the life of contemporary celebrities. 

1/1 created digital.
